monk.name: monk
monk.description: Each night*, choose a player (not yourself): they are safe from the Demon tonight.

slayer.name: slayer
slayer.description: Once per game, during the day, publicly choose a player: if they are the Demon, they die.

chef.name: chef
chef.description: You start knowing how many pairs of evil players there are.

fortuneteller.name: fortune teller
fortuneteller.description: Each night, choose 2 players: you learn if either is a Demon. There is a good player that registers as a Demon to you.

empath.name: empath
empath.description: Each night, you learn how many of your 2 alive neighbors are evil.

undertaker.name: undertaker
undertaker.description: Each night*, you learn which character died by execution today.

soldier.name: soldier
soldier.description: You are safe from the Demon.

virgin.name: virgin
virgin.description: The 1st time you are nominated, if the nominator is a Townsfolk, they are executed immediately.

washerwoman.name: washerwoman
washerwoman.description: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Townsfolk.

investigator.name: investigator
investigator.description: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Minion.

librarian.name: librarian
librarian.description: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Outsider. (Or that zero are in play.)

ravenkeeper.name: ravenkeeper
ravenkeeper.description: If you die at night, you are woken to choose a player: you learn their character.

mayor.name: mayor
mayor.description: If only 3 players live & no execution occurs, your team wins. If you die at night, another player might die instead.

butler.name: butler
butler.description: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): tomorrow, you may only vote if they are voting too.

drunk.name: drunk
drunk.description: You do not know you are the Drunk. You think you are a Townsfolk character, but you are not.

recluse.name: recluse
recluse.description: You might register as evil & as a Minion or Demon, even if dead.

saint.name: saint
saint.description: If you die by execution, your team loses.

imp.name: imp
imp.description: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If you kill yourself this way, a Minion becomes the Imp.

poisoner.name: poisoner
poisoner.description: Each night, choose a player: they are poisoned tonight and tomorrow day.

spy.name: spy
spy.description: Each night, you see the Grimoire. You might register as good & as a Townsfolk or Outsider, even if dead.

baron.name: baron
baron.description: There are extra Outsiders in play. [+2 Outsiders]

scarletwoman.name: scarlet woman
scarletwoman.description: If there are 5 or more players alive & the Demon dies, you become the Demon. (Travellers don't count.)
